}}'''0.984<ref name="blog">{{link |url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/34761639310/minecraftedu-0984-released-woo-a-new|title=MinecraftEdu 0.984 released! |date=November 1, 2012 |website=Tumblr|author=}}</ref>''' is a version of {{El|MinecraftEdu}}, released on October 29, 2012, which changes server tools and fixes some bugs. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.3.2]].

0.984 was reuploaded on November 9, 2012, to add some minor things.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Open menu for servertool.
* Tooltips to include main menu buttons.
* Replaced big admin menu icons with smaller ones.
* Translation fixes.
* Fixed updating issue (does not anymore ask for updating).
